questions.question: James is as ………………… as his brother.
questions.description: We use the positive adjective in the structure as ….as to say that people or things are similar.

questions.question: Alexander was one of ……………………. kings who ever lived.
questions.description: We use the superlative to compare one person with the whole group that they belong to.

questions.question: Martin is …………………….. than any other boy in the class.
questions.description: We use the comparative to compare one person with another person or persons.
